author: mmusich
body:
Follow-up PR of #24596, this time for the muon Tracker Alignment ALCARECO producers configurations.
In this PR, era modifiers are used to change parameters for the `pp_on_AA_2018` and `pp_on_XeXe_2017` eras such that the pp-flavored ALCARECO producer is configured as if it was the corresponding HI one.
The main change involves `ALCARECOTkAlMuonIsolated` for which the isolation parameter `ALCARECOTkAlMuonIsolated.GlobalSelector.minJetDeltaR` is set to zero.
I also profited to change the `eventSetupPathKey` to point to the HI-flavored one as we don't want to pollute the regular pp keys with HI trigger paths.
@connorpa @hroskes
title: [10.3.X] customize Tracker Alignment X->mumu ALCARECOs for pp_on_AA eras
